si.title: තමිල්නාඩු පක්ෂය ත්රිකුණාමලයේ තැපැල් ස්ථානයේදී අහිමි විය

en.title: Tamilnadu Party lost in postal in Trincomalee

summary_lines: Tamilnadu party faces defeat in Trincomalee election. Postal votes play crucial role in outcome. Local factors influence voter decisions. Political analysts attribute loss to internal conflicts and external challenges.
